lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It offers no special tax incentives for foreign investors, believing that its low corporate profits tax of 18 pct and personal income tax of 16.5 pct are sufficient.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Hong Kong likes to call its policy "positive non-intervention," meaning that it helps industry mainly by maintaining economic stability and ensuring that needed roads and harbour facilities are in place.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The engineers will learn design of application specific integrated circuits (ASIC) used in products ranging from personal computers to high-technology toys that talk.
